description:
Rena investigates her father’s expenses and worries about him. Away from others, she has a conversation with Rina that goes downhill.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Sühne Kapitel 2 - Ein Ort zum Zurückkehren
The Atonement Chapter - Part 2 - A Place to Return to
Tsumihoroboshi Hen Sono Ni: Kaeru Tokoro
罪滅し編 其の弐 還る所
